channel.title: Teaching on Ben Stenhaug
channel.description: Recent content in Teaching on Ben Stenhaug

item.title: teachR
item.description: You can find the curriculum here. Background: After completing the Stanford Data Challenge Lab, I started to think about how I would teach R. To that end, I began making YouTube videos, writing articles, and designing exercises. This curriculum is unfinished for now but I plan to return to it in the future. If you check out one piece of content, make it be the 5 verbs of dplyr exercise.
